name: The Space barygan - space trading station sim
name_original: The Space barygan - space trading station sim
description:
The game happens in a far future!
You are a rookie trader on a space trading station!
Start to trade stuff! Earn millions, sell starships!
Become an owner of planetary colonies and mines!
Become the most rich in the universe!

Distinctive features!
*lots of unique buyers
*more than 200 items for trading
*achievements
*random game events
*simulation of MMORPG marketplace
